column4: does someone got dual-head to work in gutsy ??  worked perfectly in Feisty, but since the update, only clone mode works
did you compare the xorg.conf with the one before the upgrade?
yes, and I tried to roll back to the old xorg.conf, but didn't work, it went in safe-display mode :(
is there a way to turn off autodetection? I don't care running in console to get the problem solved, but with autodetect, it seems like it won't even try my edited xorg
